Summary: Sutton, WV sighting lasting 10 minutes saw by 3 witnesses
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sutton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details on the morning of september 5th at approximately i walked on my porch to see how the weather was, something i had done every day. this morning proved to be very different in many ways... i as previously stated had just got out of the shower and was on the fron porch of my house that faces south. to my left the sky was beauitful towards the east with an array of orange,pink, and purple filling the sky. as i looked toward the west, the sky was still dreary and grey. at the very top of the tree line something caught my eye. to my amazement there was something hovering just at the top of the tree line. the object was flat black and looked to be 1-2 miles away. it was close enought that i could see some detail to it. the center part of the craft was stationary and the exterior was rotating. i watched the object for few moments and ran in to get my nephew who was living with us at the time to see this remarkable sight. he ran out of the house in nothing but a towel and keep it mind there was a frost that morning so it was cold! he shouted "what"? as i pointed to the object which was now above the trees to the right on my house. we stood there in sheer amazement and both of us were unable to move, it was a very frightening and amazing feeling at the same time. as my nephew stood there we watched the object become higher in the sky and closer. at the end of north 3rd street where i lived (my mother still lives there) there is a huge tree, the obect as we were standing in the road, went over the top of this in the distance of i'm guessing 1.5 mile. suddenly i heard someone walking there dog, and it was a lady that lived 3 houses up from me who also happened to be a 3rd grade teacher at the sutton elementary school. as soon as i turned my head toward her she looked over up and said hello with an odd expression on here face. i'm sure she was wondering why 2 teenagers are outside standing in the street one in a towel and the other in sleeping pants when its freezing at 6:30am... i asked if she could tell me what this was and pointed up at the object. she watched momentarily as i ran to my grandmothers house the next block over as i wanted my uncle to see this also, but he didn't hear me banging on the door. i watched the object dissapear over the hill behind my house moving n.nw. i ran back to my house and the lady was gone, my nephew said that she asked if it was a ufo and we said that we didn't know. she said she didn't know what that was or didn't want to know and ran up the street crying... i know what i saw and i told my uncle that day when i got home from school about the event. my aunt of whom had recently suffered a stroke was staying with my grandmother said she heard me banging on the door. so i told my uncle to ask the teacher about it when he saw her, as it is a neighbor of his too... well he did and she said she hadnever seen anything like that and honestly didn't want to talk about it. this happened almost 9 years ago and i can recount the event very clearly almost like it was yesterday. to this day i have yet to see another and i always keep my camera with me 24\7. i'm going back home to wv soon and i want to see if she'll talk to me about that day. i'll post again when i get to talk with her. i know that there are others out there that have seen things like this so please don't be afraid to share your experiences.
